title: Why ACV Auctions (ACVA) Stock Is Down Today
snippet: What Happened? Shares of online used car auction platform ACV Auctions (NASDAQ:ACVA) fell 15.7% in the afternoon session after the company reported second-quarter results that missed revenue expectations and lowered its full-year sales forecast.

title: ACV Auctions (ACVA) Nosedives on Lower 2025 Revenue Outlook
snippet: In the second quarter of the year, net loss narrowed by 57 percent to $7.3 million from $17.06 million in the same period last year.

title: ACV Auctions (NYSE:ACVA) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q2 Earnings, Stock Drops
snippet: Online used car auction platform ACV Auctions (NASDAQ:ACVA) in Q2 CY2025, but sales rose 20.6% year on year to $193.7 million. Next quarter's revenue guidance of $200.5 million underwhelmed, coming in 1.

title: ACVA Q2 Deep Dive: Margin Progress and Product Expansion Amid Market Headwinds
